english: She turned up her pretty nose in disgust .
chinese: 她厌恶地翘起了她的漂亮鼻子。

english: I began to nauseate the place i was in .
chinese: 我开始厌恶我所住的地方。

english: Bethune threw the saw away with distaste .
chinese: 白求恩厌恶地把锯子扔在一边。

english: Plastic flowers are a particular hate of mine .
chinese: 塑料花是我特别厌恶的东西。
但是任何残忍都引不起她厌恶。
厌恶造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: She was most put out by his rudeness .
chinese: 她非常厌恶他行为粗鲁。
他们是非常、非常令人厌恶的。

english: Her likes and dislikes are formed .
chinese: 她的爱好和厌恶已经形成。

english: Many people find this sort of joke distasteful .
chinese: 许多人认为这种笑话令人厌恶。

english: Margaret was horrified by his outburst .
chinese: 玛格丽特对他突然发生的攻击非常厌恶。

english: We hate and loathe these veritable fiends .
chinese: 我们痛恨、厌恶这些不折不扣的魔鬼。

english: "i'm sick of paris, and i'm sick of the quarter. "
chinese: 我厌恶巴黎，厌恶拉丁区。”

english: There is so many creeps in circulation .
chinese: 这世界上使人害怕厌恶的家伙实在太多了。
他的文风仍使读者厌恶。
迪基极端厌恶势利小人。
